Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only reflects the high quality and functionality of the product but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
